medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began two and a half days before admission and progressively worsened. Patient reported fevers and chills, but denied nausea, vomiting, or rectal bleeding. He was able to pass flatus and had a normal bowel movement on the morning of admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV positive with an undetectable viral load.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with colon cancer, unsure of age at diagnosis. Denies family history of ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease.
